title: Provisioning Cisco Cloud Wireless Controller
description: In this project, we aimed to successfully install and configure the Cisco Catalyst c9800-CL wireless controller using KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine). The c9800-CL is a powerful and flexible cloud-based wireless controller that is capable of managing both on-premises and cloud-based wireless networks. It belongs to the Cisco Catalyst 9800 series and offers a range of advanced features such as wireless intrusion prevention, location services, and guest access.
